paper_abstract: Whiteman generalized cyclotomic sequences are proven to exhibit a number of good randomness properties. In this paper we determine the linear complexity of some newly generalized cyclotomic sequences, of order four with period pq which are defined by Ding and Helleseth. The results show that all of these sequences have high linear complexity. (c) 2007 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The linear complexity of new generalized cyclotomic binary sequences of order four
